welcome_message_body: Welcome to Beverley, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that Beverley has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humaita Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humberside International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
